ArticleTitle.sentence: Functional characterization of novel IL-2 transcriptional inhibitors.

event.clue: Functional characterization of novel IL-2 transcriptional inhibitors.

AbstractText.sentence: IL-2-mediated T cell proliferation is a critical early event in the inflammatory process.

event.clue: IL-2-mediated T cell proliferation is a critical early event in the inflammatory process.

AbstractText.sentence: Formation of the NFAT-1 transcriptional complex on the IL-2 promoter is essential for IL-2 transcription.

event.clue: Formation of the NFAT-1 transcriptional complex on the IL-2 promoter is essential for IL-2 transcription.

AbstractText.sentence: Using a cell line that is stably transfected with a trimer of the NFAT-1 regulatory element linked to a lac-Z reporter gene, we screened for inhibitors of NFAT-1-mediated beta-galactosidase activity.
